section.para: To thaw previously frozen item sites by class code and site, select the Thaw Item Sites by Class Code Site option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Thaw Item Sites by Class Code/Site

section.para: When thawing previously frozen item sites by class code and site, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to thaw item sites by site for all class codes.
Specify class code whose item sites by site you want to thaw.
Enter a class code pattern to select a range of class codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Specify site whose item sites are to be thawed.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Thaws previously frozen item sites by specified class code(s) and site.
